results

Class ResultsFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • results.ResultsFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ResultsFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
    The Class ResultsFragment is responsible for showing all nmap results of the selected SA.

    • Nested Class Summary

        android.app.Fragment.InstantiationException, android.app.Fragment.SavedState

      • onCreateView

        public android.view.View onCreateView(android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                             android.view.ViewGroup container,
                             android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        This function is called when the view is created. The results table, the heading and the button are initiated, and the title of the view is set to "Results".

      • initHeading

        Parameters:
        rootView - the root view

      • showDetailsDialog

        public void showDetailsDialog(android.view.View resultView)
        Show details dialog. This dialog consists of a table with two columns. The first one describes the information type which is accessed after the unmarshalling of xml result in AM and the second one is the value of the information for the specific result. The dialog dismisses when the button "OK" is pressed. In order to fill the table the DetailsRequest is called.
        Parameters:
        resultView - the result view

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Sets the title in the ActionBar of the current Activity.
        Parameters:
        title - the new title
